summary:
The mighty Buster Sword!
Crusher of spines, and dismemberer of limbs!

4,600+ subscribes on Steam
LOCATION: Crushed into a stone at the bridge by the farm around Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
The mighty Buster Sword!
Crusher of spines, and dismemberer of limbs!

4,600+ subscribes on Steam
LOCATION: Crushed into a stone at the bridge by the farm around Whiterun.

This is the sequel to my "Toon Buster Sword" mod, and is of the original basic form.
The Buster Sword is very powerful, having a long reach and 100 base damage.
It is 25 weight units, and is craftable and temperable (steel smithing required to forge)
The textures are CUSTOM.
The Buster Sword's ID is xx000D63 (xx = load order #)

UPDATED:
There are now (technically) four different versions of this sword in the game.
The original, held like a greatsword.
The original, held like a battleaxe/warhammer.
The weaker version, held like a greatsword.
The weaker version, held like a battleaxe/warhammer.
ALL FOUR ARE CRAFTABLE AND TEMPERABLE.

YES. The "LOW" version (indicated by a (L) after the name) does not entirely fit into the hand. This requires a remodel, which also requires a retexture. The remodeling is easy, the retexturing sucks. So it is on the lower end of my list of mods to tweak. Also, please be aware that I accept requests. On top of the requests I get, there's also my girlfriend who I need to spend more time with, I am in college for graphic design, I am in the middle of several projects, and I am also job-hunting. So I adore and work better with your patience. Thank you all for being so awesome.

This is the second buster sword of several I'm making.
The "fusion sword" that resembles this buster will be created soon.
It is going to have all 7 parts that assemble into one Buster.
Yes, it will indeed look badass.


Many of the answers you're probably going to ask have been answered in my Steam comments.
If you don't have Steam, still feel free to ask!
I'll make a random video of me slaughtering Solitude with it soon.
Also on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=235068169
******************************************************************************************************************************
